dcterms:creator: M. Soleymani
J. Lichtenauer
T. Pun
M. Pantic
dcterms:description: MAHNOB-HCI is a public multi-modal database recorded by Soleymani et al. It includes data from two experiments: one is an emotion elicitation experiment and the other is an implicit tagging experiment. The database contains color videos recorded in a realistic HCI scenario, along with corresponding ground truth HR signals.
dcterms:title: MAHNOB-HCI

dcterms:description: VideoHR is a simple database collected by the authors themselves, used for testing the proposed framework in a controlled environment.
dcterms:title: VideoHR
